The British School of Guangzhou Dear parents and staff of BSG,
Please note the changes below for Utahloy’s fun-run on Saturday 8th March 2014:
Due to safety considerations the HOPE FUN RUN has been relocated to the Utahloy Zeng Cheng campus. Transportation for all vendors, volunteers, sponsors and participants will be conveniently provided free of charge.
Details:
Pick up times and points:
Volunteers 7:00am pick up at Citic
Sponsors & Vendors transport arranged individually. Please contact Ada Gan. 18102808030
Participants transport 8:00am pick up at these locations:
Citic Plaza Utahloy International School Guangzhou Liede Metro station exit D Zhujiang New Town
Both races will start at 10:00am on the Zeng Cheng campus.
Transport will leave the Zeng Cheng campus at 1:00pm and return to designated stops by 2:15pm.
http://hopefunrun.eventbrite.hk will have transport options available to select for race participants.
Regards,
Amanda Boby
Teaching Assistant and Community Action and Fundraising Coordinator
The British School of Guangzhou
